item.title: Mentioned by Pembroke Daily Observer
item.description:
Gallant calls for moratorium on ripping the rails
Renfrew-Nipissing-Pembroke MP Cheryl Gallant is calling for a 10-year moratorium on the removal of the Canadian National Railway (CN) rail lines in Eastern Ontario and Western Quebec. While the removal of the lines in the Pontiac has been halted ...

item.title: Mentioned by Barry's Bay This Week
item.description:
BLR receives grant for municipal complex expansion
MP Cheryl Gallant announced April 4 the Township of Brudenell, Lyndoch, Raglan received $93,133 through the Community Infrastructure Improvement Fund, which will cover one-third of the cost of an expansion to the municipal complex. Taking part in the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Government of Canada Supports Expansion of Renfrew County Pharmaceutical ...
The funding was announced today by Cheryl Gallant, Member of Parliament for Renfrew-Nipissing-Pembroke, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario). "Our Government is pleased to support projects that provide the tools that businesses need to grow and prosper," said MP Gallant.
